title: Advisors Keep Missing Client Cues. How More Self Awareness Can Help.
description: "Advisors are in a way in a therapeutic sort of relationship that requires staying with curiosity longer than maybe they'd like to," says author and management consultant Beverly Flaxington, who champions the importance of EQ and active listening.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: "Advisors are in a way in a therapeutic sort of relationship that requires staying with curiosity longer than maybe they'd like to," says author and management consultant Beverly Flaxington, who champions the importance of EQ and active listening.
